product.title: Azurite Chenille Honey Yellow Curtain
product.description: Their azurite chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish. These soft honey curtains fuse a plush, luxury feel in a contemporary yellow tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. Pair with cool modern greys or contrasting navy to act as a statement piece within your interior. This fabric will provide an elegant finish to rooms filled with wooden and natural tones.

relproducts.title: Rimini Miami Yellow - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Well, the name says it all. The rimini's miami yellow is bright, funky, and summery. Due to its lightweight but sturdy fabric, it has a surprising level of opaqueness, despite its light colour. Not that you'll notice, with the colour of sunshine in your window. This is the ideal hue for creating a sunny, cheery kitchen, or a fun, energetic home office. Pair with creams and pretty florals for some country chic, or with sky blue shades for a fun, summery feel.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Solar Yellow Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling stockholm range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This bright, sunny, yellow roller blind brightens any room, making this quality dimout made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Our roller blinds are great for privacy and light control, and come with sleek white components.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Mellow Yellow Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This pastel mellow yellow roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This stockholm dusty yellow fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Solar Yellow Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This bright sunny yellow roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Primrose Yellow
relproducts.description: Stirlo primrose yellow plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.description: Introduce bright sunshine feels within your space with their rainbow 25mm yellow aluminium venetian blind. This funky yellow shade is perfect for adding a splash of colour to the interiors of your home or office. relproducts.title: Ecowood Chenille Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The ecowood's chenille satin is discreet and demure in a matt, creamy white finish. This authentic-looking faux wood is formed from high quality, hardwearing pvc, making it both sturdy, wipe-clean, and water-resistant - and therefore ideal for any family-centred room. Offset a duck egg colour scheme in a contemporary kitchen, setting the chenille satin amidst painted walls and cream or wooden units.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Chenille Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The creamy, off-white chenille fine grain, from the hardwearing ecowood range, is light and relaxed, ensuring that it will match a range of decor schemes. This durable, pvc blind is quick and simple to install, freeing up your time to sit and enjoy it. Enhance a daring, tropical purple feature wall in a teenager's bedroom by hanging the chenille fine grain against it, using glossy and glistening silvers as accents.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Deluxe Chenille Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Blend style and class with durable usability with the ecowood deluxe in chenille satin, a designer-style, wooden venetian blind with a matt cream finish. This streamlined piece is backed with matching, vertical ladder tapes to hold and adjust the slats, giving further cohesion and coordination. Construct a modern design scheme in your home office, painting the walls in pale baby blue and matching the carpet to the soothing chenille satin.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Deluxe Chenille Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The designer look of the ecowood deluxe range simply cannot be beaten, and the pale cream chenille fine grain adds a new level of sophistication to the collection. Its classic look belies its hardwearing formula, as it is made from high quality, wood-look pvc for durability and water-resistance. Complement a classic brown and cream colour scheme by surrounding the chenille fine grain with chocolate browns, delicate taupes, and light oatmeals.
